text: {"answer":"A","reasoning":"ii is incorrect because the Digest/Pandects profoundly shaped Western (especially continental) legal tradition; it was not marginal compared to the Codex. v is incorrect because while a testator may impose conditions/burdens, enforcement is not by “any interested party” in general but typically by heirs/beneficiaries or competent authorities/executors depending on the case. The other statements are broadly correct in Swiss/private law context."}
